news.title: REA India appoints Praveen Sharma as its CEO
news.para: REA Group has named Praveen Sharma as the new CEO of REA India, adding him to their executive leadership team. Sharma, bringing over 25 years of experience from companies like Paytm and Google, will start in July.

news.title: Gujarat waives 80% duty on property transfers sans sale deeds
news.para: The decision, issued by the revenue department under Section 9A of the Gujarat Stamp Act, comes in response to representations made by citizens and elected representatives.

news.title: Over three lakh clear house tax in Q1 FY26 in Lucknow
news.para: The LMC offered a 10% rebate on house tax payments made through online mode until June 30, 2025. With this deadline now over, a revised rebate structure comes into effect from July 1.

news.title: Pune civic body extends property tax discount deadline to July 7
news.para: Property owners should ensure that they pay the tax on time and avoid a last-minute rush," said Avinash Sapkal, head of property tax department of Pune Municipal Corporation (PMC).

news.title: Goa: Green nod for sand mining in Mandovi challenged in NGT
news.para: The group has currently challenged one EC granted on Feb 3, 2025, and informed the tribunal that it would be filing separate appeals against all the remaining 11 ECs as well.

news.title: People’s Education Society buys two Bengaluru properties for ₹110 crore
news.para: People’s Education Society (PES) has invested Rs 110 crore in Bengaluru's Sadashivanagar, acquiring two independent homes, signaling strong demand for high-value properties. These transactions, along with other recent high-end real estate deals, highlight the enduring appeal of prime locations to institutions and high-net-worth individuals. The increasing number of millionaires in India further fuels this demand for exclusive properties.

news.title: Manimajra housing plan, new ad sites get Chandigarh civic body's approval
news.para: Chandigarh civic authority will now send the minutes of the meeting to the Chandigarh administration, and after its approval, MC will set the ball rolling for the project.

news.title: Draft rules for cooperative housing societies likely to be notified in two weeks: Maharashtra government
news.para: The proposed changes aim to reduce conflict, simplify redevelopment, and bring more transparency to society operations across the state, said officials.

news.title: Gurugram: Four illegal houses off Golf Course Road demolished, two buildings sealed
news.para: Officials from DTCP said the enforcement team demolished four houses that were being built in violation of approved layout plans. These structures, according to officials, were raised without obtaining the mandatory approvals and clearances.

news.title: Patna civic body nets ₹40 crore property tax in three months
news.para: This collection follows a 5% rebate offered to property owners for prompt payment, which was valid till Monday, June 30. The municipal body has set an ambitious target of Rs 141 crore for the financial year, significantly higher than the Rs 117 crore collected in 2024-25.

news.title: Ghaziabad civic body rolls back property tax hike
news.para: Mayor Sunita Dayal called a special board meeting to discuss the issue, and after a heated debate in the house, the board repealed the decision.

news.title: Noida administration imposes fine on Kendriya Vihar for failing to register lifts
news.para: According to Ramesh Chaudhary, assistant director, electrical safety, 30 other societies have been identified across the district where lifts are yet to be registered.

news.title: Odisha housing department urges ULBs to hasten verification of PMAY 2.0 applications
news.para: Satish Chandra Singh, joint secretary of the Odisha Urban Housing Mission, expressed displeasure over the slow progress of the verification process and asked them to expedite the process while generating awareness among beneficiaries.

news.title: Raymond Realty set to list on exchanges, looks of over 20% annual growth
news.para: Raymond Realty, the real estate division of Raymond Group, is set to be listed on Indian stock exchanges after its demerger. This strategic move aims to unlock shareholder value by establishing a focused, debt-free real estate entity.

news.title: Lucknow development body warns allottees to clear dues or lose property
news.para: The LDA has compiled a final list of such defaulters. If they do not clear their dues, their registration fees will be forfeited and their allotments cancelled.

news.title: Hyatt Hotels to sell Playa's real estate portfolio for $2 billion
news.para: Hyatt had entered into a deal to buy Playa, which operates 24 high-end, all-inclusive resorts across Mexico, Jamaica and the Dominican Republic, for $2.6 billion including debt in February.

news.title: Nirala World to invest ₹1,000 crore in two Greater Noida mixed-use projects
news.para: Nirala World is set to invest ₹1,000 crore in two mixed-use projects in Greater Noida West, featuring retail, offices, and studio apartments. While expanding, the company faces challenges due to soaring land prices in Noida and Greater Noida.

news.title: Hong Kong's New World Development gets crucial $11 billion refinancing deal
news.para: New World said it had refinanced portions of its existing offshore unsecured debt, including bank loans, through a new facility and had also aligned the terms of its remaining loan agreements.
